description: Monitors plant operations, occasionally hits control panels out of frustration.
Conducts safety drills (usually reluctantly) and oversees plant security.
Handled bowling alley equipment maintenance and helped customers with lanes and scoring.
Gained experience in customer service and machine troubleshooting.

education.name: Nuclear Safety Training Program
education.desc2: Trained on nuclear safety protocols and emergency response.

thesis.description: “Button Pushing: A Theoretical Analysis of Simplified Nuclear Plant Operations” – An investigation into the simplification of complex control panels for easier safety management.

education.name: Springfield High School
education.desc2: Studied general curriculum with a focus on PE and shop class

thesis.description: “Donuts and Society: A Nutritional Perspective” – An exploration of donut consumption trends among high school students and its effects on attention span and PE performance.

projects.title: Donut Procurement Initiative
projects.description: Improved donut availability and distribution at the power plant.

projects.title: Power Plant Efficiency Boost
projects.description: Attempted to reduce energy costs by dimming lights and increasing nap times.

projects.title: Moe's Tavern Quiz Night Champion
projects.description: Participated in and occasionally won local quiz nights at Moe's Tavern.

projects.title: Bart's Science Fair Volcano
projects.description: Helped Bart with a baking soda and vinegar volcano for his school science fair.

hobbies.title: Beer Tasting
hobbies.description: Regular patron of Moe's Tavern, known for his love of Duff Beer.

hobbies.title: Watching TV
hobbies.description: An avid TV watcher, with a particular love for sitcoms and sports.

hobbies.title: Eating Donuts
hobbies.description: Has a deep passion for donuts, especially those with sprinkles.
